sql.content: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM User_Objects A WHERE UPPER(A.Object_Name) = UPPER(':objectName')

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT Table_Name AS ObjectName ,Table_Schema AS DBName FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Tables UNION ALL SELECT Table_Name AS ObjectName ,Table_Schema AS DBName FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Views UNION ALL SELECT Trigger_Name AS ObjectName ,Trigger_Schema AS DBName FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Triggers UNION ALL SELECT Routine_Name AS ObjectName ,Routine_Schema AS DBName FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.Routines ) A WHERE A.DBName = Database() AND UPPER(A.ObjectName) = UPPER(':objectName')
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SysObjects A WHERE UPPER(A.Name) = UPPER(':objectName')

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT TabName AS ObjectName ,TabSchema AS DBName FROM SysCat.Tables UNION ALL SELECT ViewName AS ObjectName ,ViewSchema AS DBName FROM SysCat.Views UNION ALL SELECT TriggerName AS ObjectName ,TriggerSchema AS DBName FROM SysCat.Triggers UNION ALL SELECT RoutineName AS ObjectName ,RoutineSchema AS DBName FROM SysCat.Routines ) A WHERE A.DBName = Current Schema AND UPPER(A.ObjectName) = UPPER(':objectName')
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Sqlite_Master A WHERE UPPER(A.name) = UPPER(':objectName')
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PG_Tables A WHERE A.schemaname = 'public' AND UPPER(A.tablename) = UPPER(':objectName')
